name: Wine Jar With Bamboo Casing: Spirits Awaiting Moonrise
description: A wine jar protected by a casing made of bamboo that can be commonly seen all across Liyue.\nWinemakers choose a cave of just the right humidity level and store the jars away for several years, resulting in fine wines enjoyed by thirsty patrons.\nThere is a constant risk of the wine jars rattling and breaking during transport, so the jars are always handled together with their bamboo frames.
